verses.verse: Song of Quiet Trust A Song of Ascents. Of David. (Ps 101.5; Isa 5.15; Rom 12.16) O LORD, my heart is not lifted up; my eyes are not raised too high; I do not occupy myself with things too great and too marvelous for me.

(Ps 62.1; Mt 18.3; 1 Cor 14.20) But I have calmed and quieted my soul, like a weaned child with its mother; my soul is like the weaned child that is with me. (Or my soul within me is like a weaned child)
(Ps 130.7) O Israel, hope in the LORD from this time on and forevermore.
